content: also available on etsy 1 skill level intermediate three sizes suitable for women as well this pattern men s size l 44 chest stich count will be in bold throughout to make larger sizes the different stitch counts will be indicated throughout the pattern men s size xl 46 chest men s size 2xl 48 chest instructions to shorten/lengthen sleeves are included gauge not included materials size j 6 00mm hook for all sizes of the sweater 312 yards per skein lion brand scarfie acrylic/wool blend bulky #5 any bulky #5 will be suitable color eggplant/taupe large 1300 yards - 5 skeins xlarge approx 1500 yards - 5 skeins 2x approx 1700 yards - 6 skeins 6 buttons size 1 1/8 larger or smaller buttons will be suitable 1 https //www etsy com/listing/686518462/crochet-mens-cardigan-a-sweater-for-pat
